basics.name: Alberto Márquez Flores
basics.label: Application Developer and Pixel Artist with expertise in cross-platform application development, game design, and team leadership.
basics.summary: Application developer with over 2 years of experience as a video game developer and former Technical Support for Riot Games. I live in Seville, Spain, and have worked in different environments: from solving technical inquiries to managing a team of diverse artists.

location.address: Miguel Mañara St., No. 9, 4th Floor, Apt. B

work.name: Monster Theater
work.summary: Lead pixel art animator and character designer for Atomic Owl. Managed the art team, overseeing all work, organizing objectives, and adjusting deadlines.
highlights: Coordinated art production workflows and deadlines.
Designed and animated key character sprites for the project.

work.name: The Game Kitchen
work.summary: Created pixel art character sprites and animations for indie games.

Worked closely with designers to maintain artistic consistency.

highlights: Resolved technical issues for a diverse player base in English and Spanish.
Improved player satisfaction through proactive problem-solving.
